name: Climb up the down
description:
The action of the game takes place in one of the secret closed cities of the former USSR. An incident occurs as a result of which the entire city has to be evacuated. The exact reasons for what happened are unknown, but the place where it all began is roughly known. It is there that the government directs the protagonist of the game, his task is only to find out the exact place from where the threats are spreading, but as usually happens, something went wrong ...

Climb up the down is a first-person survival horror that offers:

  • Random generation of levels.
  • Random arrangement of items.
  • The level can change during the game depending on the state of the player.
  • Random events that can both harm and help the player.
  • Puzzles, the solution of which can affect the plot.
  • The plot consists of several chapters and has different endings.
  • The passage of each new chapter depends on the ending of the previous one.
  • Opponents not only see, but also hear, it is worth making less noise.

In the future:
  • Achievements
  • Cards
  • Co-op mode for multiple players.
  • VR mode
  • Other miscellaneous content
